shortDescription.value: Popcorn Chicken® with 1 Regular Chips and 1 Regular Drink.

longDescription.value: Say hello to our Snack Popcorn Chicken®, feat. bite-sized golden pieces of real breast fillet chicken cooked to perfection in our signature seasoning. Plus, Regular thick-cut Chips and a Drink. Don’t be shy.
